title: Tablet
desc: Welcome to a new era of iPhone. Beautifully bright 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display.1 Ceramic Shield with 4x better drop performance.2 Incredible low-light photography with Night mode on all cameras. Cinema-grade Dolby Vision video recording, editing, and playback. Powerful A14 Bionic chip. And new MagSafe accessories for easy attach and faster wireless charging.3 Let the fun begin.
